title: I’m Not a Villainess!! Just Because I Can Control Darkness Doesn’t Mean I’m a Bad Person! (WN) - Novel Updates
image: https://cdn.novelupdates.com/images/2018/02/私は悪役令嬢なんかじゃないっ闇使いだからって必ずしも悪役だと思うなよ.jpg
tags: Adapted to Manga   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Magic   Nobles   Overpowered Protagonist   Racism   Reincarnated in Another World   Schemes And Conspiracies   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Otonashi Satsuki   音無砂月
description:
Sakura was murdered by her family.

The place she was born in again was exactly the same place she read about in her favorite novel.

That is, Reshiya, a kingdom that coexists with spirits.

The person she was born as was Claudia, a member of the Letsya duke family that commanded the kingdom’s army for generations; and also hated by everyone for the divine protection she received from the dark spirits’ king.

Because of that, Claudia was feared by her surroundings from a very young age and her family had a hard time bringing her up.

In the novel, Claudia was forced to marry into another kingdom in order to bind a peace treaty. But when Reshiya opposed to the pact in the last moment, Claudia was taken as a hostage and murdered in the enemy kingdom.

Could Sakura who still held memories of her past life avoid the sorrowful fate of Claudia?>
